SAMPLES.DESCRIPTION: The user information will be returned in a flat object.

PARAMETERS.NAME: accessCode
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Returned access code from Oauth mechanism

PARAMETERS.NAME: userID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The user to log in as

DESCRIPTION:
Login an aXcelerate User. The parameters below refer only to POST requests. The API Token is still required for this endpoint.

As part of ongoing improvements to infrastructure and security, the authentication mechanism, including this endpoint, has changed.

For more infomration on using the authentication mechanism, click here: Login Api
